Description: Bare head of Fausta, right, waved hair and mantled. (obverse)
Spes standing to front, looking left, two children in her arms. (reverse)
State: Associated with: Roman Empire Ancient Greece and Rome: Roman Empire
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: John de Monins Johnson
Bibliographic references: RIC7 / The Roman Imperial Coinage, vol. 7: Constantine and Licinius AD 313-337 (203, p.387)
O'Connell et al 2014 / Antinoupolis at the British Museum (60)
